title: Mexican Ham and Cheese Breakfast Casserole

Ingredients.12: 1 salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 5x7-inch glass dish.

Directions.2: Mix ham, tomatoes, salsa, 1/4 cup milk, Cheddar cheese, jalapeno Jack cheese, cilantro, and green onions.

Directions.3: Place half of the tortillas into the prepared baking dish and top with half of the ham mixture. Repeat layers. In another bowl, mix eggs, 3/4 cup milk, salt, and pepper. Pour over mixture in the baking dish.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven until top starts to brown, 60 to 75 minutes. Remove from the oven and let sit for 10 minutes before cutting. Sprinkle with cotija cheese.
